answers.answer: 10 days ! I can't wait to see my little man.
Lol I'm barely 14 weeks today. But congrats ladies
54 days to go cant wait. I have an ultrasound next week to see him again
5Days To Go
53 days to go..yayyyy..counting days!!
59 days to go!

8 wks to go. Cant believe its so soon now and in single digits! The beginning went so slow now its speeding by! Going well so far..still working for about another month...excited for the baby shower..havent had one in 8 yrs!!.just getting over the flu which was a shocker to get so still trying to stay hydrated and drink plenty of water...
I have 18 more days to go and very aggravated with being pregnant for so long im just ready

14Days till being induced, but showing a bunch of signs that i may only be days away. I hope i am only days away, being induced will be a drag. But either way, i cant wait to meet my little bundle. Hes going to be perfect. This pregnancy has been far from easy. Hyperthyroidism, blood clotting disorder that needed blood thinner, gestational diabetes.. But he has gone through it all with flying colors. And i never had nausea, swelling, or bleeding. So i cant really complain. I am going to have a perfect little boy soon. :-) good luck to all you mamas. :-)
12 days
11 weeks to go! It's very exciting and nerve wrecking at the same time.
I have 10 weeks to go also feel like I am ready
I was due yesterday... :) i am so ready! Having a sweep tues so hopefully soon!!!!
39 days for mee! Soo excited!  Lol
8 weeks left as of today. I can't wait to meet him.
10 weeks for me too! I'm so excited to meet my princess!
14+4 days to go yay!!!!
46 days left. Yay!
36 days for me.... I have a fractured hernia and my lil one LOVE kicking me there... its sooooo painfull.... seeing the dr when im 36 weeks.... so only 1 week to go b4 I see my lil princess.....
7 days to go ... getting so excited and nervous!

question: I have 10 weeks to go anyone else getting closer to there due date? How Is The Pregnancy Going For you.
title: almost done anyone else
